      • Color4

        public Color4()
        Stand-in for a vector, in which the places represent R, G, B and A values.

      • Color4

        public Color4(VecF4 v)
        Stand-in for a vector, in which the places represent R, G, B and A values.
        Parameters:
        v - A vector to be cloned as a color value.

      • Color4

        public Color4(float r,
      float g,
      float b,
      float a)
        Stand-in for a vector, in which the places represent R, G, B and A values.
        Parameters:
        r - The Red component to this color.
        g - The Green component to this color.
        b - The Blue component to this color.
        a - The Alpha component to this color.
